On my first night I had an issue with the bed as it creaked loudly with any micro movement, however when I relayed this to the staff it was immediately fixed by the maintenance crew! The room is equipped with everything you need from coffee brew bags to shortbread nibbles to hairdryer. Housekeeping come round every day and are very lovely people.
